(947)                      July 7, '11-5- B.-34-1911. 
                                Sanitarium, Calif., June 7, 1911. 

Elder J. A. Burden, Loma Linda, Calif. 

Dear Brother and Sister Burden:- 
     I want to say to you both that I am thankful I was moved to speak as I did concerning the piece of land in front of the Loma Linda Sanitarium. I was urged by the Spirit of God to make the pledge of one thousand dollars; and I did so hoping that others, who were better able to give than I, would follow my example. I dared not leave the meeting without following the conviction I had; and now I feel that I have done my duty, showing my faith by my works. 


                              -574-
